name: Hank Anderson
info:
• 简体中文名: 汉克·安德森
  • 别名: ハンク・アンダーソン
  • 性别: 男
  • 生日: September 6, 1985
  • 身高: 1.92 m
  • 体重: 209 lbs
detail:
Lieutenant Hank Anderson is a human in Detroit: Become Human. He is a grizzled and alcoholic detective in the Detroit City Police Department who hates androids.

Tasked with investigating cases involving deviant androids, he is assigned android Connor to assist him.
